content: निरुक्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Derivation, etymological interpretation of words. {@--2@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) An artificial explanation of the derivation of a word; thus defined:-- निरुक्तिर्योगतो नाम्नामन्यार्थत्वप्रकल्पनं . ईदृशैश्चरितैर्जाने सत्यं दोषाकरो भवान् .. <ls>Chandr. 5. 168</ls> (where दोषाकरः is equal to दोषाणामाकरः). {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Yāska's commentary on the Nighaṇṭus.
